title: What should I do with the disfunctional electric gadgets? - Quora

response.answer_text: I normally ask the electrician who is known to me for decades to take it away and do what he wants with it. He may use some spare parts from that or sell it as scrap… In the case of refrigerators and washing machines etc. we followed the exchange model…they took away the old piece when we bought the new gadget…gave us a token discount…

As an engineer I pull apart the casing and try to first get a brief idea of how everything was set on the PCB in factory and how it works. Then I find for parts which can be desoldered and brought out of PCB so that they can be used in my future works. It typically includes transformers , speakers,power sockets, inductors, switches, relays, batteries,etc. Afterwards I throw them out.
